name: Hand of the Gods: Core Set Bundle
summary:
5 Pantheons. All Cards. 

Packed with 285 cards, the Core Set Bundle will allow an incredibly diverse gameplay experience. With this bundle, you'll be ready to build multiple decks and dominate the battlefield. 

Wield the power of Zeus, Raise the grave with Ah Puch, or cast Nu Wa’s powerful spells to lead your armies to victory. 

Bundle Unlocks:
All Chinese Pantheon cards
All Egyptian Pantheon cards
All Greek Pantheon cards
All Mayan Pantheon cards
All Neutral Pantheon cards

esrb.synopsis: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
